A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"It's not going to go the way you think.\"  \n\nThis is the movie that makes Star Wars relevant again.  They could have kept making easy to watch fun movies for ever and I would have happily watched them\, however\, this movie instead did something new.  In doing so it took something I love to another level.  Thank you Last Jedi cast and crew.
